entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect global:: for value tuples #41598
  • Unable to read appsettings using appcmd.exe #41596
  • The openapi2client (Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi) complains about boolean valued required key on header object of OpenAPI spec #41595
  • The openapi2client (Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi) complains about specification extensions at the path item object level of an OpenAPI spec #41593
  • OpenIdConnect: setting the ClaimsIssuer property in configuration options has no effect #41589
  • PageModel ValidationContext ObjectInstance missing property values #41582
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Doc misinformation for the property displayName in the UserLoginInfo Constructor #41284
    Backlog
  • Blazor project template - lower left nav can be inaccessible in short browser window #41050
    7.0-preview5
  • Blazor Css Isolation Is Not Recognized in Maui-Blazor WinUI Application #41594
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #41572
  • Java Client for SignalR - Invoking 'onClosed' method failed #41579
  • WebApplicationFactory<T>.CreateClient() fails when using app.Urls.Add() in minimal api. #39777
    7.0-preview5
  • BuilderRenderTree doesn't create "checked" attribute for input #41586
  • Hot reload doesn't work on F5 but works when run dotnet watch #41585
  • Microsoft.JSInterop can't build Release on Version 6.0.4 #41581
  • Target html and body tags in css isolated files #41580
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #41515
  • [Blazor] Remove some file in _content from publish #41551

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle unexpected errors #41597
    area-runtime
  • Merge HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 request cookies on Kestrel #41591
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Merged

  • Pass through CancellationToken #41531
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Revert "Use 1es-windows-2019 again" #41590
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Fix documentation for the property displayName in the UserLoginInfo Constructor #41565
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Fix selenium-standalone invocation #41592
    7.0-preview5
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, 7.0-preview5
  • Bump SDK to latest nightly #41588
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `af29db7` to `8ded48c` #41460
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8ded48c` to `4348d4e` #41583
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Add a no-op IServerAddressesFeature implementation to TestServer.Features #41570
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Initialize Activity with parent ID #41568
    area-runtime
  • Surrogate argument list in Minimal APIs #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • HELIX failures investigations #41563
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Spruce up OpenApiSchema generation #41468
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add CancellationToken overloads for reading multipart form sections #41533
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Convert all possible `DllImport`s to `LibraryImport` for .NET 7+ #41573
    area-runtime
  • Don't allocate method name strings in protocol #41465
    area-signalr
  • Fix templates sourceName & port of template fixes from main #41536
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 6.0.x
